items.name: Sparring Gloves
items.desc:
+5% Critical Strike Chance
+10% Dodge Chance

items.name: Deathblade
items.desc:
Contributing to a kill grants the holder +10 Attack Damage for the rest of combat.
This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4).

items.name: Giant Slayer
items.desc: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 20% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1600 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 60%.

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
items.desc: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 400 damage.

items.name: Spear of Shojin
items.desc: The holder's attacks restore 8 additional Mana.

items.name: Guardian Angel
items.desc:
Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.desc:
Physical damage heals the holder for 33% of the damage dealt.

Upon falling below 40% Health, the holder gains a 30% max health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

items.name: Zeke's Herald
items.desc: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
items.shortDesc:
+AS
wearer and
allies within
1 hex in
the same row

items.name: Skirmisher Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Skirmisher trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Infinity Edge
items.desc:
Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.shortDesc:
+75% Crit.
(>100% Crit Chance become
+1% Crit Dmg)

items.name: Rapid Firecannon
items.desc:
Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex and grants 40% bonus Attack Speed.

The wearer's Basic Attacks can no longer miss.

items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
items.desc:
Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

items.name: Statikk Shiv
items.desc: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.
items.shortDesc:
AP dmg
and MR shred
to 4 emenies
every 3rd ATK

items.name: Titan’s Resolve
items.desc:
When the holder attacks or takes damage, they gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the holder gains 25 Armor and Magic Resist.
items.shortDesc:
Stack AD&AP
when taken
dmg or crit hit.
At max stacks
gain +AR&MR

items.name: Runaan's Hurricane
items.desc: The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

items.name: Zz'Rot Portal
items.desc:
At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 4 hexes.

When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.
items.shortDesc:
Taunts enemies
Voidspawn
arises when
holder dies
It taunts again

items.name: Legionnaire Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Legionnaire trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion].
Elusive - cannot be crafted.]

items.name: Last Whisper
items.desc:
When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
items.desc: Grants 75 bonus Ability Power (including components).

items.name: Archangel's Staff
items.desc: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain bonus Ability Power equal to 40% of their maximum Mana (this bonus applies to that Ability cast).

items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
items.desc:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 
300/350/400★ damage for 8 seconds.

items.name: Ionic Spark
items.desc: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.
items.shortDesc:
Reduce enemy
MR and taking
Magic dmg
within 2 Hex

items.name: Morellonomicon
items.desc:
When the holder deals magic damage or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Spellweaver Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Spellweaver trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
items.desc: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains 40% bonus Critical Strike Damage.
items.shortDesc:
Holder's ability
can crit and
deals bonus
critical dmg

items.name: Blue Buff
items.desc:
After casting their Ability, the holder gains 20 mana.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.shortDesc:
After casting
a ability
wearer's mana
is set to 20.

items.name: Frozen Heart
items.desc:
Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 25%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Chalice of Power
items.desc: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 30 Ability Power for the rest of combat.
items.shortDesc:
+30 AP
for all allies
within 1 hex
in same row

items.name: Redemption
items.desc: Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 1 Hex, healing them for 18% of their missing Health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from multi-target, abilities and attacks for 5 seconds.

items.name: Renewer Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Renewer trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Hand of Justice
items.desc:
The holder gains both of the following:
- +10 Attack Damage and +10 Ability Power.
- Attacks and Abilities heal for 10% of damage dealt.

At the beginning of each planning phase, one of these buffs is increased to 35(%).

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.desc: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 80/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).
items.shortDesc:
Negate
bonus dmg
from crit. and
reflect dmg
to enemies

items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
items.desc: The holder gains 18 Armor and 18 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

items.name: Sunfire Cape
items.desc:
Every 2.5 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 20% of their maximum health as true damage over 8 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.shortDesc:
Burn an enemy
within 2 hexes
dealt dmg
reduce healing

items.name: Ironclad Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Ironclad trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion].
Elusive - cannot be crafted.]

items.name: Shroud of Stillness
items.desc:
When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 35% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Dragon's Claw
items.desc: Grants 200 bonus Magic Resist (including components). On being hit by magic or true damage from an Ability, launch a fireball at the Ability's caster that deals magic damage equal to 30% of their max Health (1 second cooldown).

items.name: Zephyr
items.desc:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Redeemed Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Redeemed trait.

items.desc:
